content: रभस {%<ab>a.</ab>%} [रभ्-असच्] {@--1@} Violent, impetuous, fierce, wild. {@--2@} Strong, intense, vehement, powerful, ardent, eager (as desire &c.); रभसया नु दिगंतदिदृक्षया <ls>Ki. 5. 1</ls>; <ls>R. 9. 61</ls>; <ls>Mu. 5. 24.</ls> {@--3@} Rash, precipitate. {@--4@} Joyful, glad. {@--5@} <ab>Ved.</ab> Strengthening. --सः {@--1@} Violence, force, impetuosity, haste, speed, hurry, vehemence; आलीषु केलीरभसेन बाला मुहुर्ममालापमपालपंती <ls>Bv. 2. 12</ls>; त्वभिसरणरभसेन वलंती <ls>Gīt. 6</ls>; <ls>Śi. 6. 13</ls>, <ls n="Śi.">11. 23</ls>; <ls>Ki. 9. 47.</ls> {@--2@} Rashness, precipitateness, headlong haste; अतिरभ सकृतानां कर्मणामाविपत्तेर्भवति हृदयदाही शल्यतुल्यो विपाकः <ls>Bh. 2. 99.</ls> {@--3@} Anger, passion, rage, fury. {@--4@} Regret, sorrow. {@--5@} Joy, pleasure, delight; मनसि रभसविभवे हरिरुदयतु सुकृतेन <ls>Gīt. 5.</ls> {@--6@} Ardent desire, eagerness.
